resources.string: The break statement can also be used to jump out of a loop.
Arrays are used to store multiple values in a single variable
String variable contains a collection of characters surrounded\n by double quotes:
The \'switch\' selection structure must end with the default\n case.
The modifiers public and static cannot written in either order\n \'public static\' or \'static public\'\"
\"In an instance method or a constructor, \'this\' is a reference\n to the current object.\"
Constructor overloading is not possible in Java
Variable name can begin with a letter, $, or _
